commit.message: Add DisplayData for StateSpecs used by stateful ParDos

nodes.bodyText: This should be more of a debug string where no info is skipped, like MoreObjects.toStringHelper(this).add(clazz)

Here, too, maybe using the format of MoreObjects.toStringHelper(this).add("coder", valueCoder) will make it all uniform. But since this is really a helper for display data, and DisplayData can be structured (somewhat?) it probably makes sense to structure it here using https://github.com/apache/beam/blob/master/sdks/java/core/src/main/java/org/apache/beam/sdk/transforms/display/DisplayData.java#L145
